title: Vase, 1894
markings: Marked:  741C/W.  Impressed: RP cipher with eight flames.
inscribed:
Artist's monogram incised on bottom, underglaze:  Impressed on bottom, underglaze:  RP cipher with 8 flames; 741 C/W
Incised with artist's monogram:  CJ. D/L
dimensions: H x diam.: 14.6 x 7.6 cm (5 3/4 x 3 in.)
creditline: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
description: White clay body, cast.  Ovoid body, decorated with two herons flying along rushes.  Birds in underglaze white slip (appear yellow) and rushes in green.  Against a shaded background of ochre, forest green, sage green, brown and russet.  Yellow glaze overall.  Bottom and interior glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1894.
1894. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Marcia and William Goodman. 1984-84-10.
